description:
They have sharpened their working practices and made remote collaboration the norm using a variety of tools.

So how do remote teams improve and maintain high levels of performance?

In this talk we will introduce the “Aggregation of Marginal Gains” and draw on examples from fields outside of Agile Product Delivery to help show why every 1% improvement in a remote working environment allows remote teams to achieve exceptional levels of performance.

SPEAKERS:

Dave Hewett
Engagement Manager
Equal Experts

Brian Mason
Delivery Manager
Equal Experts

***
This talk will be recorded and a link to the recording placed in the Comments shortly after the event
***
title: “Aggregation of Marginal Gains” helps Distributed Teams become High-Performing
